Define.name: JIN_BI_EQUIPMENT_UP
Define.explain: 装备升级所消耗的金币与能源所占比例

Define.name: JIN_BI_WING_UP
Define.explain: 僚机升级所消耗的金币与经验所占比例

Define.name: ZHUANG_BEI_CHAI_FEN
Define.explain: 装备拆分时所获得的能源与升级所消耗能源的比例

Define.name: LIAO_JI_TUN_SHI
Define.explain: 僚机被吞噬时所获得的经验与升级所消耗经验的比例

Define.name: ZHUANG_BEI_SHENG_JI_CHANG_LIANG
Define.explain: 装备升级时的总的参数。

Define.name: HEI_DAN_XIE_DAI_SHANG_XIAN
Define.explain: 经典模式核弹携带上限

Define.name: XIN_SHENG_QU_DONG
Define.explain: 开局后可以冲刺10屏的距离

Define.name: SI_WANG_QU_DONG
Define.explain: 死亡后可以冲刺5屏的距离

Define.name: LAN_SE_FANG_HU_TIME
Define.explain: 蓝色防护罩持续时间为5秒

Define.name: KUANG_RE_QU_DONG
Define.explain: 战斗中冲刺3屏

Define.name: HUI_FU_QI_XUE
Define.explain: 战斗中获得爱心可以恢复20%的气血

Define.name: KUANG_BAO_SHU_XING_JIA_CHENG
Define.explain: 进入狂暴状态攻速和子弹大小会提高50%

Define.name: KUANG_BAO_CHI_XU_TIME
Define.explain: 狂暴持续时间为5秒，注狂暴时间结束相当于叠加层数减一

Define.name: KUANG_BAO_XU_YAO_PU_TONG
Define.explain: 进入狂暴需要的普通子弹数量

Define.name: KUANG_BAO_XU_YAO_KUANG_BAO
Define.explain: 进入狂暴需要的狂暴子弹数量

Define.name: PU_TONG_ZI_DAN_WEI_LI
Define.explain: 普通子弹一层的攻速和子弹大小提高是10%

Define.name: KUANG_BAO_WEI_LI_SUAI_JIAN
Define.explain: 受到攻击狂暴层数减一层

Define.name: JI_FEN_XIAO
Define.explain: 吃一个小水晶获得2积分

Define.name: JI_FEN_ZHONG
Define.explain: 吃一个中水晶获得5积分

Define.name: JI_FEN_DA
Define.explain: 吃一个大水晶获得10积分

Define.name: CI_TIE_FAN_WEI
Define.explain: 单位是屏，可以吸收0.5屏范围内的道具

Define.name: MAX_JI_JIA_HP
Define.explain: 机甲生命最大值

Define.name: MAX_JI_JIA_ATTACK
Define.explain: 机甲攻击最大值

Define.name: MAX_JI_JIA_ASPD
Define.explain: 机甲攻速最大值

Define.name: ID_JI_JIA_MIN
Define.explain: 机甲最小值

Define.name: ID_JI_JIA_MAX
Define.explain: 机甲最大值

Define.name: ID_LIAO_JI
Define.explain: 僚机

Define.name: ID_ZHUANG_BEI
Define.explain: 装备

Define.name: ID_XIAO_GUAI
Define.explain: 小怪

Define.name: ID_SHOP_DAO_JU
Define.explain: 商店道具

Define.name: ID_COMBAT_DAO_JU
Define.explain: 战斗道具

Define.name: ID_XIAO_HAO_PIN
Define.explain: 消耗品

Define.name: ID_JI_NENG
Define.explain: 技能id

Define.name: ID_JI_CHU_SHU_XING
Define.explain: 基础属性

Define.name: ID_STUFF_MIN
Define.explain: 最小材料id

Define.name: ID_STUFF_MAX
Define.explain: 最大材料id
